title: when will the preseason hit OCE
body: looking for the exact (or close) time that the patch will become available

replies.body: normals will still be up or will the game be down for a couple hours

Servers will shut down at around 5:30 AM AEDT for maintenance and update to patch 7.22. Servers should be back up at around 8:30 AM AEDT if everything does smoothly. Keep an eye on http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce for updates. :)
